sub_title:
Aligning strategy with execution by connecting company, team and employee goals to measurable results.
Helping customers accomplish growth and savings by helping them to achieve their goals and objectives.
summary:
An accomplished, innovative, and resilient person with leadership capabilities over multiple functions and executive roles sales management, sales business development, strategic partnerships, sales operations, service delivery, change management and marketing strategy across various sectors/industries. Adept in orchestrating the entirety of the sales process and pipeline from lead generation to close. Has consistently supported the development of sales strategy and executing defined plans to achieve targets and key performance indicators.
Possessing an exceptional track record in building, developing and leading high-performance teams who have gone on to exceed sales targets and quota year on year. Proficient at increasing sales revenue and profitability through strong vision, relentless customer focus and development of new markets. Multinational business transformation and change management experience coupled with a strong commercial and business acumen, working in complex and challenging multicultural environments and diverse business models. Highly competent in managing multiple countries and diverse functional organizations, both with direct reports and through indirect influence.
